attributes.action: To actively seek natural  causes for global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The earth's surface is 90% ocean. The remaining 10% of land mass is far from fully occupied by man. For example: the Sahara, mostly uninhabited, is of such a size that North America will sit within it.  The logical conclusion is that clmate change is due to the effect of the Oceans, solar activity and other natural factors. This theory deserves unbiased investigation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
